/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. In the distance, a tall radio tower stands out against the overcast sky, a testament to the city's modern infrastructure. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the blend of nature and urban development.
